title: Turkey feather
summaries: The Turkey feather is a pet-summoning item which summons a Pet Turkey when used. It is purchased from the Merchant for 10 each, during the Thanksgiving season (November 1-30). The Turkey feather can be used with the Cursed stuffing to summon Turkor the Ungrateful.

To summon Turkor the Ungrateful, the player must first summon the Pet Turkey with the Turkey feather, then use the Cursed Stuffing. This will despawn the Turkey pet and consume the Turkey feather in the player's inventory. Turkor the Ungrateful can only be summoned during the Thanksgiving season.

statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
